items.title: Flight cancellations begin as shutdown throws major wrench in air travel
items.description: The Trump administration on Wednesday announced major flight cancellations would begin Friday if the government shutdown drags on.

items.title: How each airline is handling the flight cuts, starting Friday: What to know
items.description: Mass flight cancellations are set to start Friday due to strains from the federal government shutdown. Here's how airlines are responding.
